mapper.select: SELECT eventid, ename, DATE_FORMAT(startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as startdate, DATE_FORMAT(enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') as enddate, salerate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY eventid desc ) AS num, ename, startdate, enddate, salerate, eventid FROM event ) AS t WHERE num BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{pageStart}+14 ORDER BY num;
mapper.insert: insert into event (img, ename, econtent, startdate, enddate, salerate, inputdate, status) values (#{image}, #{ename}, #{econtent}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{salerate}, now(), '1')
mapper.update: update event set ename = #{ename}, econtent = #{econtent}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, salerate = #{salerate} where eventid = #{eventid}
